snippet: France’s highest administrative court upheld a ban on a show by the comedian, Dieudonné M’Bala M’Bala, in Tours, days after it was also banned in Nantes.
abstract: French comedian Dieudonne M’Bala M’Bala drops his controversial television show after several towns ban it for anti-Semitic language; promises new show that will not be objectionable.
lead_paragraph: France’s highest administrative court upheld a ban on a show by the comedian, Dieudonné M’Bala M’Bala, in Tours, days after it was also banned in Nantes.

headline.main: Show Banned, French Comedian Has New One
headline.print_headline: Show Banned, French Comedian Has New One
